p: One potential answer lies in the nature of our treatments, as compared to those previously employed, Aklin and Urpelainen also test a security frame [ 16], but it is much shorter than ours. Myers et al. [ 18] also examine environmental and national security frames, but they do so in the context of longer newspaper articles. Severson and Coleman [ 19] also examine scientific environmental frames, but they were conveyed with vignettes containing short arguments. And, the frames of Kahan et al. [ 11], Yarnal et al. [ 13], Schuldt et al. [ 14], Petrovic et al. [ 15], and Wiest et al. [ 20] have substantially different content than our own.
